now, the ip is my computers IP right?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2007, 07:49:05 PM[/size][hr]if you get it right i will give you your award…

item.title: Need Help with portforwarding-What do you put as the LAN Address?
item.dc:creator: @Coder_X Coder X
item.description:
@Coder_X wrote:

Make sure that’s in the Virtual Server part…

Name : Name it anything(use your server name i guess)
Protocol: Both (tcp, and the other one) (dcp maybe?)
Private Port: Usually 43594 (Depends what source your using)
Public Port: Usually 43594 (Depends what source your using)
LAN Server: Your I.P.

Then click add

Read full topic
